author: kylesferrazza
body:
<!--

If you are a PowerShell Team member, please make sure you choose the Reviewer(s) and Assignee for your PR.
If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

-->
I maintain [powershell](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/powershell/) and [powershell-git](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/powershell-git/) on the Arch Linux User Repository.

This pull requests adds information for installing powershell on Arch Linux.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
@kylesferrazza,
Thanks for having already signed the Contribution License Agreement. Your agreement has not been validated yet. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@kylesferrazza Thanks for your contribution!
Also welcome to give us feedbacks from Arch Linux community.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: BTW I'm super happy about have AUR repos :D I'm an Arch Linux user.

title: Add Arch Linux installation information
